name: SalimQuest (ytraboz)
description:
Hi ! 

SalimQuest is the first video game I made with my amazing colleagues from Dawson College's Independant Video Game Design program. We were tasked with creating a maze, hope you like it!

Along with my teammates, I worked on game and level design concepts, did a few 3D models, lesser coding tasks, produced all the sound design and composed the soundtracks. 

Objective : Find the hidden gem in the maze and escape!

Controls :  

- W/A/S/D keys to move

- Use the mouse to control the camera and Left click to interact with objects

Big cheers to my incredible teammates!  

Carl Boisvert https://carl-boisvert.itch.io/

Pierre-Luc Lapointe https://sc0urg3.itch.io/

Ricardo Lorenzo Garcia https://itch.io/profile/lerickyraccoon

Myself : Charles-Antoine Solis https://ytraboz.itch.io/
